110.msg: Words or phrases that are not in the document's primary language may not be identified.
110.descr: Words and phrases not in the document's primary language are marked.

275.msg: Loading web page may cause new window to open.
275.descr: Loading the web page does not cause a new window to open.

203.msg: Data table summary may not describe navigation and structure of the table.
203.descr: All data table summaries describe navigation and structure of the table.

125.msg: input element label, type of "radio", is not positioned close to control.
125.descr: All input elements, type of "radio", have a label that is positioned close to the control.

272.msg: Form may delete information without allowing for recovery.
272.descr: Information deleted using a web page can be recovered.

306.msg: The contrast between the colour of text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AAA.
306.descr: Text colour must provide high contrast with its background colour

59.msg: Image used for input element may have Alt text that does not identify the purpose or function as the image.
59.descr: Alt text for all input elements with a type attribute value of "image" identifies the purpose or function of the image.

270.msg: Unicode right-to-left marks or left-to-right marks may be required.
270.descr: Unicode right-to-left marks or left-to-right marks are used whenever the HTML bidirectional algorithm produces undesirable results.

244.msg: Data table with both row and column headers does not use scope to identify cells.
244.descr: Data tables that contain both row and column headers use the scope attribute to identify cells.

308.msg: The contrast between the colour of active link text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AAA.
308.descr: Active link text colour must provide high contrast with its background colour.

20.msg: Link to multimedia may be missing a text transcript.
20.descr: Links to multimedia require a text transcript.

304.msg: The contrast between the colour of selected link text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AA.
304.descr: Selected link text colour must contrast sufficiently with its background colour.

187.msg: input element has more than one associated label.
187.descr: Each input element has only one associated label.

119.msg: input element, type of "checkbox", missing an associated label.
119.descr: All input elements, type of "checkbox", have an explicitly associated label.

72.msg: Meta refresh with a time-out is used.
72.descr: Meta refresh is not used with a time-out.

261.msg: Sections may not be marked with headers.
261.descr: Each section of content is marked with a header element.

98.msg: Abbreviations may not be marked with abbr element.
98.descr: Abbreviations must be marked with abbr element.

22.sc: Success Criteria 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below Threshold (A)

123.msg: input element label, type of "checkbox" is not positioned close to control.
123.descr: All input elements, type of "checkbox", have a label that is positioned close to the control.

216.msg: input element, type of "file", has no text in label.
216.descr: All input elements, type of "file", have a label containing text.

62.msg: Image used in input element - Suspicious Alt text (placeholder).
62.descr: Image used in input element - Alt text should not be placeholder text.

268.msg: Form submission error messages may not provide assistance.
268.descr: All form submission error messages provide assistance in correcting the error.

86.descr: Color alone should not be used in the script.

103.msg: script may not be keyboard accessible - ondblclick requires keyboard specific functions.
103.descr: All ondblclick event handlers have corresponding keyboard-specific functions.

44.msg: h3 may be used for formatting.
44.descr: All h3 elements are not used for formatting.

193.msg: Form submit button image may contain text that is not in Alt text.
193.descr: Alt text for all input elements with a type attribute value of "image" contains all non decorative text in the image.

43.msg: h2 may be used for formatting.
43.descr: All h2 elements are not used for formatting.

307.msg: The contrast between the colour of visited link text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AAA.
307.descr: Visited link text colour must provide high contrast with its background colour.

114.descr: All layout tables have an empty summary attribute or no summary attribute.

32.msg: frame title may not describe the purpose or function of the frame.
32.descr: All frame titles identify the purpose or function of the frame.

209.msg: select element's label is not positioned close to control.
209.descr: All select elements have a label that is positioned close to the control.

206.msg: input element, type of "checkbox", has no text in label.
206.descr: All input elements, type of "checkbox", have a label containing text.

151.msg: Data table may require a caption.
151.descr: All data tables contain a caption unless the table is identified within the document.

222.msg: Poor color contrast between link text and background color.
222.descr: The luminosity contrast ratio between link text and background color is at least 5:1.

105.msg: script may not be keyboard accessible - onmousemove requires keyboard specific functions.
105.descr: All onmousemove event handlers have corresponding keyboard-specific functions.

80.msg: object may be missing a text equivalent.
80.descr: All objects contain a text equivalent of the object.

267.msg: Form submission error messages may not identify empty required fields.
267.descr: All form submission error messages identify any empty required fields.

218.msg: input element, type of "text", label may not describe the purpose or function of the control.
218.descr: All input elements, type of "text", have a label that describes the purpose or function of the control.

136.msg: Data table may require th elements.
136.descr: All data tables contain th elements.

213.msg: input element, type of "text", has no text in label.
213.descr: All input elements, type of "text", have a label containing text.

265.msg: Tab order may not follow logical order.
265.descr: The tab order specified by tabindex attributes follows a logical order.

305.msg: The contrast between the colour of link text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AA.
305.descr: Link text colour must contrast sufficiently with its background colour.

55.descr: input should not use color alone.

239.msg: img has title attribute and image may be decorative.
239.descr: title attribute for all img elements is absent or the empty string ("") if the image is decorative.

208.msg: Label text is empty for select element.
208.descr: All select elements have a label that contains text.

271.msg: dir attribute may be required to identify changes in text direction.
271.descr: All changes in text direction are marked using the dir attribute.

96.msg: textarea label is not positioned close to control.
96.descr: All textarea elements have a label that is positioned close to control.

65.msg: Alt text for area element may not identify the link destination.
65.descr: Alt text for all area elements identifies the link destination.

189.msg: label may not describe its associated control.
189.descr: Each label describes its asssociated input element.

266.msg: Document may require a breadcrumb trail.
266.descr: The document contains a breadcrumb trail if it is part of a collection.

210.msg: select element's label may not describe the purpose or function of the control.
210.descr: All select elements have a label that describes the purpose or function of the control.

30.sc: Success Criteria 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below Threshold (A)

57.msg: input element, type of "text", missing an associated label.
57.descr: All input elements, type of "text", have an explicitly associated label.

68.msg: area opens new window may be missing warning.
68.descr: area should not open new window without warning.

247.msg: Form missing fieldset and legend to group multiple checkbox buttons.
247.descr: All checkbox groups are marked using fieldset and legend elements.

118.msg: input element, type of "password", missing an associated label.
118.descr: All input elements, type of "password", have an explicitly associated label.

82.msg: p element may be misused (could be a header).
82.descr: All p elements are not used as headers.

231.msg: Table may require colgroup and col elements to group table columns.
231.descr: Use colgroup and col elements to group columns.

112.descr: All data table summaries contain text.

163.descr: All embed elements have an associated noembed element that contains a text equivalent to the embed element.

2.msg: Image has suspicious Alt text (same as filename).
2.descr: Alt text is not the same as the filename unless author has confirmed it is correct.

121.msg: input element, type of "radio", missing an associated label.
121.descr: All input elements, type of "radio", have an explicitly associated label.

145.msg: Link to multimedia may be missing a link to text alternative.
145.descr: Links to multimedia have a link to text alternative.

207.msg: input element, type of "password", has no text in label.
207.descr: All input elements, type of "password", have a label containing text.

47.msg: h6 may be used for formatting.
47.descr: All h6 elements are not used for formatting.

168.msg: Form missing fieldset and legend to group multiple radio buttons.
168.descr: All radio button groups are marked using fieldset and legend elements.

6.msg: Image has suspicious Alt text (placeholder text).
6.descr: Alt text for all img elements is not placeholder text unless author has confirmed it is correct.

38.msg: Header nesting - header following h2 is incorrect.
38.descr: The header following an h2 is h1, h2 or h3.

301.msg: The contrast between the colour of text and its background for the element is not sufficient  to meet WCAG2.0 Level AA.
301.descr: Provide sufficient contrast between text and background colours.

211.msg: input element label, type of "text", is not positioned close to control.
211.descr: All input elements, type of "text", have a label that is positioned close to the control.

131.msg: Long quotations may not be marked using the blockquote element.
131.descr: Use the blockquote element to mark up block quotations.

242.msg: Table caption may not identify the table.

99.msg: Acronyms may not be marked with acronym element.
99.descr: Acronyms must be marked with acronym element.

7.msg: Image used as anchor is missing valid Alt text.
7.descr: Alt text for all img elements used as source anchors is not empty when there is no other text in the anchor.

91.msg: select element missing an associated label.
91.descr: All select elements have an explicitly associated label.

238.descr: All input elements, except those with with a type attribute value of "image", do not have an alt attribute.

248.msg: Visual lists may not be properly marked.

262.msg: Groups of links with a related purpose are not marked.
262.descr: All groups of links with a related purpose are marked.

54.msg: title might not describe the document.

84.msg: ASCII art possibly missing a skipover link.
84.descr: ASCII art should have a skipover link.

41.msg: Header nesting - header following h5 is incorrect.
41.descr: The header following an h5 is h6 or any header less than h6.

258.msg: applet may not provide a keyboard mechanism to return focus to the parent window.
258.descr: applet provides a keyboard mechanism to return focus to the parent window.

220.msg: input element, type of "radio", label may not describe the purpose or function of the control.
220.descr: All input elements, type of "radio", have a label that describes the purpose or function of the control.

133.descr: All layout tables make sense when linearized.

241.msg: Tabular information may be missing table markup.
241.descr: Table markup is used for all tabular information.

1.descr: All img elements have an alt attribute.

219.msg: input element, type of "checkbox", label may not describe the purpose or function of the control.
219.descr: All input elements, type of "checkbox", have a label that describes the purpose or function of the control.

184.descr: Sites must have a site map.

115.descr: All layout tables do not contain caption elements.

8.msg: img element may require a long description.
8.descr: A long description is used for each img element that does not have Alt text conveying the same information as the image.

25.msg: applet body may not contain a text equivalent.
25.descr: applet contains a text equivalent in the body of the applet.

179.msg: Reference to glossary may be missing.
179.descr: Provide a reference to a glossary.

178.msg: Alt text does not convey the same information as the image.
178.descr: Alt text for all img elements that are not used as source anchors conveys the same information as the image.

252.msg: All text colors are not set.
252.descr: All text colors or no text colors are set.

217.msg: input element, type of "password", label may not describe the purpose or function of the control.
217.descr: All input elements, type of "password", have a label that describes the purpose or function of the control.

46.msg: h5 may be used for formatting.
46.descr: All h5 elements are not used for formatting.

194.msg: area image may contain text that is not in Alt text.
194.descr: Alt text for all area elements contains all non decorative text in the image area.

89.msg: script user interface may not be accessible.
89.descr: User interface for script must be accessible.

14.msg: Image may be using color alone.
14.descr: For all img elements, text does not refer to the image by color alone.

40.msg: Header nesting - header following h4 is incorrect.
40.descr: The header following an h4 is h1, h2, h3, h4 or h5.

39.msg: Header nesting - header following h3 is incorrect.
39.descr: The header following an h3 is h1, h2, h3 or h4.

124.msg: input element label, type of "file", is not positioned close to control.
124.descr: All input elements, type of "file", have a label that is positioned close to the control.

81.msg: List item used to format text.
81.descr: List items must not be used to format text.

309.msg: The contrast between the colour of selected link text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AAA.
309.descr: Selected link text colour must provide high contrast with its background colour.

212.msg: textarea has no text in label.
212.descr: All textarea elements have a label containing text.

76.msg: object user interface may not be accessible.
76.descr: object user interface must be accessible - (codebase).

243.msg: Table summary duplicates the table caption.
243.descr: Table summaries do not duplicate the table captions.

104.descr: All onmousedown event handlers have an associated onkeydown event handler.

66.msg: area link to sound file may be missing text transcript.
66.descr: area link to sound file must have text transcript.

245.msg: Data table with more than one row/column of headers does not use id and headers attributes to identify cells.
245.descr: Data tables that contain more than one row/column of headers use the id and headers attributes to identify cells.

120.msg: input element, type of "file", missing an associated label.
120.descr: All input elements, type of "file", have an explicitly associated label.

45.msg: h4 may be used for formatting.
45.descr: All h4 elements are not used for formatting.

310.msg: Link text colour must provide high contrast with its background colour.
310.descr: The contrast between the colour of link text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AAA.

60.msg: Image used for input element has long Alt text.
60.descr: Alt text for all input elements with a type attribute value of "image" is less than 100 characters (English) or the user has confirmed that the Alt text is as short as possible.

246.msg: All required form fields may not be indicated as required.
246.descr: All form fields that are required are indicated to the user as required.

92.msg: select element may cause extreme change in context.
92.descr: All select elements do not cause an extreme change in context.

10.sc: Success Criteria 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below Threshold (A)
10.descr: All img elements have associated images that do not flicker.

26.msg: applet user interface may not be accessible.
26.descr: applet user interface must be accessible.

260.msg: embed may not provide a keyboard mechanism to return focus to the parent window.
260.descr: embed provides a keyboard mechanism to return focus to the parent window.

37.msg: Header nesting - header following h1 is incorrect.
37.descr: The header following an h1 is h1 or h2.

154.msg: pre element may be misused to create tabular layout.
154.descr: pre element should not be used to create tabular layout.

87.sc: Success Criteria 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below Threshold (A)
87.descr: script should not cause screen flicker.

58.msg: Image used for input element is missing Alt text.
58.descr: All input elements with a type attribute value of "image" have an alt attribute.

224.msg: Poor color contrast between visited link text and background color.
224.descr: The luminosity contrast ratio between visited link text and background color is at least 5:1.

259.msg: object may not provide a keyboard mechanism to return focus to the parent window.
259.descr: object provides a keyboard mechanism to return focus to the parent window.

263.msg: Repeated blocks of content may not appear in the same frame within the frameset.
263.descr: Repeated blocks of content appear in the same frame within the frameset.

122.msg: input element label, type of "password" is not positioned close to control.
122.descr: All input elements, type of "password", have a label that is positioned close to the control.

204.msg: input element, type of "radio", has no text in label.
204.descr: All input elements, type of "radio", have a label containing text.

18.msg: Anchor that opens new window may be missing warning.
18.descr: Anchor should not open new window without warning.

303.msg: The contrast between the colour of active link text and its background is not sufficient to meet WCAG2.0 Level AA.
303.descr: Active link text colour must contrast sufficiently with its background colour.

21.descr: applet should not use color alone.

16.msg: Alt text is not empty and image may be decorative.
16.descr: Alt text for all img elements is the empty string ("") if the image is decorative.

205.msg: input element, type of "file", label may not describe the purpose or function of the control.
205.descr: All input elements, type of "file", have a label that describes the purpose or function of the control.

17.msg: Sound file may be missing text transcript.
17.descr: Sound file must have a text transcript.

64.msg: Imagemap area element missing alt attribute.
64.descr: All area elements have an alt attribute.

269.sc: Success Criteria 3.3.4 Error Prevention (Legal, Financial, Data) (AA)
269.msg: Form submission data may not be presented to the user before final acceptance of an irreversable transaction.
269.descr: Form submission data is presented to the user before final acceptance for all irreversable transactions.

19.msg: Link text may not be meaningful.
19.descr: Link text is meaningful when read out of context.

160.sc: Success Criteria 1.2.3 Audio Description or Media Alternative (Prerecorded) (A)
160.msg: object may require a long description.
160.descr: object may require a long description.

28.msg: Document may be missing a "skip to content" link.
28.descr: A "skip to content" link appears on all pages with blocks of material prior to the main document.

106.msg: script not keyboard accessible - onmouseout missing onblur.
106.descr: All onmouseout event handlers have an associated onblur event handler.

95.msg: textarea element missing an associated label.
95.descr: All textarea elements have an explicitly associated label.

107.msg: onmouseover event handler missing onfocus event handler.
107.descr: All onmouseover event handlers have an associated onfocus event handler.

11.msg: Image may contain text that is not in Alt text.
11.descr: Alt text for all img elements contains all text in the image unless the image text is decorative or appears elsewhere in the document.

52.msg: title text may be too long.

188.descr: Each label associated with an input element contains text.

146.sc: Success Criteria 1.2.3 Audio Description or Media Alternative (Prerecorded) (A)
146.msg: object link to multimedia file may be missing equivalent alternative.
146.descr: object link to multimedia file require equivalent alternatives (e.g., captions or auditory descriptions of the visual track).

137.msg: Layout table may be misusing th elements.
137.descr: All layout tables do not contain th elements.

223.msg: Poor color contrast between active link text and background color.
223.descr: The luminosity contrast ratio between active link text and background color is at least 5:1.

274.msg: Change of context may occur without user activation.
274.descr: Change of context occurs only by user activation unless a warning is provided.

302.msg: The contrast between the colour of visited link text and its background for the element is not sufficient  to meet WCAG2.0 Level AA.
302.descr: Visited link text colour must contrast sufficiently with its background colour.

31.descr: All frames have a title attribute.

111.descr: All complex data tables have a summary.

42.msg: h1 may be used for formatting.
42.descr: All h1 elements are not used for formatting.

3.msg: Image Alt text may be too long.

230.msg: Table may require thead, tfoot and tbody elements to group repeated table row structures.
230.descr: Use thead to group repeated table headers, tfoot for repeated table footers, and tbody for other groups of rows.

24.msg: Text equivalent may not have been updated when applet changed.
24.descr: Text equivalents for applet must be updated if applet changes.

251.msg: Image may contain text with poor contrast.
251.descr: The luminosity contrast ratio between text and background color in all images is at least 5:1.

100.msg: blockquote may be used for indentation.
100.descr: blockquote must not be used for indentation.

253.msg: This image may contain text with poor contrast.
253.descr: The luminosity contrast ratio between text and background color in all images is at least 10:1.

273.msg: Right to left reading order not marked or marked incorrectly.
273.descr: Reading order direction is marked using the html element's dir attribute if the document's primary language is read right to left.

23.msg: applet may not contain a text equivalent in the alt attribute.
23.descr: applet contains a text equivalent in the alt attribute of the applet.

221.msg: Poor color contrast between text and background color.
221.descr: The luminosity contrast ratio between text and background color is at least 5:1.

73.msg: object may be using color alone.
73.descr: object must not use color alone.

108.msg: onmouseup event handler missing onkeyup event handler.
108.descr: All onmouseup event handlers have an associated onkeyup event handler.

250.msg: Text may refer to items by shape, size, or relative position alone.
250.descr: All text references do not use shape, size, or relative position alone.

276.msg: Repeated components may not appear in the same relative order each time they appear.
276.descr: Repeated components appear in the same relative order each time they appear.
